Package Presentation

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Presentation.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Class created in order to implement methods that are useful for the program such as showing the menu and user input control.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    Menu()
    Constructor of the menu class implementing a scanner for user input.
